name: Knight Fun
description:
You can spend few minutes of your life playing as an abstract Knight in Tournament where Holy Grail is the price.

Use Your sword to defeat enemies and take treasure to Your base.

Have Fun.

My first game ever. 

I've tried to recreate 1st level of cool game Knight Squad as my current skills allowed. 

Now it has only 1Player mode.

All music and sounds are free to use, as I know. Text me if I'm wrong.

I will be glad to read your comments.
